author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Enerchina Announces Proposed Rights Issue To Raise Not More Than HK$1.31 Bln
text:
March 28 (Reuters) - Enerchina Holdings Ltd:
* ‍ANNOUNCES PROPOSED RIGHTS ISSUE OF NOT LESS THAN 2.91 BILLION RIGHTS SHARES AND NOT MORE THAN 2.92 BILLION RIGHTS SHARES AT HK$0.45 PER SHARE​
* ‍PROPOSES TO RAISE GROSS PROCEEDS OF NOT LESS THAN HK$1,307.64 MILLION AND NOT MORE THAN HK$1,314.40 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
